feature1.explanation: Both texts demonstrate consistent use of hyphens, colons, commas, and quotation marks.

feature2.explanation: Both texts show similarities in lexical variation and word choice, as well as in grammatical categories and part of speech usage.

feature3.explanation: The texts exhibit comparable sentence structures in terms of complexity and coherence.

feature4.explanation: While the topics differ, the narrative style, tone, and mood are consistent across both texts.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were found in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and lack of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
